channel.title: Noobie SD card multiple issues
channel.description: HI there just started with Axoloti maybe you can help me getting started. I would like to play stereo samples out form my SD card to the main output. I would love to have the patch start by itself. I managed to start the demo patch at startup. Now I'm trying the SD card busyness. I read on the forum that should be formatted by Axoloti. The problem is I can't find Window> Remote as described. Can somebody tell me how to do it? I'm on mac with a new Axoloti and the latest software. Thanks! A

item.title: Noobie SD card multiple issues
item.dc:creator: @jestern Alberto
item.description:
@jestern wrote:

just saw it perfect, also found how to upload the files, testing now. Thanks a lot.
Much easier!
A

Read full topic

item.title: Noobie SD card multiple issues
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

jestern:

I read on the forum that should be formatted by Axoloti. The problem is I can't find Window> Remote as described.

you dont need to use this anymore,

there is now a util/format object , all you need to do is place this in an empty patch, take it live, then press format.

Read full topic

item.title: Noobie SD card multiple issues
item.dc:creator: @jestern Alberto
item.description:
@jestern wrote:

HI there just started with Axoloti maybe you can help me getting started. I would like to play stereo samples out form my SD card to the main output. I would love to have the patch start by itself. I managed to start the demo patch at startup. Now I'm trying the SD card busyness.
I read on the forum that should be formatted by Axoloti. The problem is I can't find Window> Remote as described.
Can somebody tell me how to do it? I'm on mac with a new Axoloti and the latest software. Thanks!
A
